game_description: Go Big or Go Home. Welcome to BIG BALLERS VR. Play basketball, football and much more. You will perform jaw-dropping contact dunks and compete with up to 10 players in epic showdowns of half court and full court gameplay. Rise to the top to become the #1 baller in online competitive while getting fit with realistic physics-based motion controls. Enjoy private parks and tons of character customization. Master easy-to-learn dribbling mechanics and make friends in this immersive world. Play now!

I also love this game because the accessories and super fun to put on and super cheap. It has a variety of clothes, items, hats to choose from and they all look super good. There are also various fun detailed maps to play with your friends and family. You can play 1s 2s 3s 4s with anybody. If you wanna join a private match just type in a code and tell the people your playing with yo join up. The graphics are also very good. It hardly ever lags and you can have to 90 fps.
